name: Graveyard Ghosts Attack
description:
Stop the ghosts from entering the dimensional portal. Use your Ghost Laser to zap the ghosts as they try to escape into the portal. Don't let any ghosts escape into the portal, the results could be deadly. Watch out, some ghosts shoot slime. Zap the number of ghosts needed to complete each level to advance to the next level. Complete all levels and win the game!

"This game a great for kids of ALL ages" ~ JG

How many ghost can you zap? You have to play to find out :)

Happy Halloween


** If you like this app, please write or post a review and also help us spread the word by sharing this app with your friends and associates on Facebook, Twitter and Youtube. Thank you for your support.

** We work very hard to make our apps the best they can be and want our users to have a great user experience. If you have ideas on how to make this app better, or If you are experiencing technical problems with this app, please contact us by pressing the "App Support" button located in the Information screen.

Thank you.
